name: Bean Rich Text Document
summary: Learn about .BEAN files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: BEAN files use the same formatting as Rich Text Format Directory (.RTFD) files.

description: Word processing document created with Bean, a free word processor for Mac OS X powered by the same engine as Apple Text Edit; supports live word count, text styles, graphics, and custom printed margin settings.
